title: Sonnet 90 - best describes the speaker's situation

content.question: Which of the following best describes the speaker's present situation?

choices.label: He has recently lost faith in his friend.
He has been beset with various problems.
He has barely overcome many misfortunes.
He has seen his fortunes at court decline.

content.answer: He has been beset with various problems.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
